author: Lolita C. Baldor / AP
title: Captain Asks Navy to Take U.S.S. Theodore Roosevelt Aircraft Carrier Off of Duty to Save Crew From Coronavirus
description: The captain of the Navy aircraft carrier facing a growing outbreak of the coronavirus is asking for permission to isolate the bulk of his roughly 5,000 crew members.
content: (WASHINGTON) — The captain of a U.S. Navy aircraft carrier facing a growing outbreak of the coronavirus is asking for permission to isolate the bulk of his roughly 5,000 crew members on shore, which would take the warship out of duty in an effort to save live… [+5256 chars]
